item.title: [FCSC 2021 - pwn] cheapie
item.description: Cheapie (pwn - 198 pts) ÃŠtes-vous familier avec le tas ? Yay a heap challenge ! Setup The given libc didn’t have any symbols and no loader was provided, so I ran pwninit to retrieve a libc with symbols and a loader. Which I didn’t realise until me writing this, is that pwninit gave me a different libc, that changed the final part of the exploit : getting a shell !
